Dedication

For Vyjanti , [My]0-i light at the end of the tunnelâ€ ¦ All that , and more .

Appetizer Peace Of Mind By : S. [Ann Cole]55-ann cole [I]0-i saw [her]293-her , Sitting by [the riverside]294-the riverside — [Her]293-her eyes closed , [Her]293-her smile ever so bright , [Her]293-her head under a crown — A crown of lilies …

Peace of mind .

[I]0-i saw [her]293-her again , Dancing in the rain , [Her]293-her smile was the same , [No one]295-no one could disdain . [She]293-her danced as [a child , Placid , meek , mild …

Peace of mind]296-a child , placid , meek , mild … peace of mind .

Ah ! Here [she]293-her is , Sitting on a swing , [She]293-her sways to and fro , [Her]293-her golden strands the wind blows . Yes , [her]293-her smile is the same , [Her]293-her countenance remains .

Peace of mind .

Prologue

[He]297-his was tired . [Dog]57-dog - tired . Amped up by pleasure mere minutes ago , [his]297-his heartbeat was beginning to even out , pushing [him]297-his onward and into the soothing darkness of sleep . Unfortunately , [he]297-his was yanked back from the beckoning darkness when the feel of soft feminine hands chased by flutters of kisses played on [his]297-his chest . Languid , [he]297-his opened [his]297-his eyes to the annoying realization that [the female of the night]298-the female of the night was still present . Weariness , it seemed , had delivered [him]297-his a hard slug over the head , for it was wonted of [him]297-his to dismiss the source of [his]297-his temporary pleasure at the very minute [he]297-his found [his]297-his release . [His]297-his eyes skidded over [the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of [his]297-his chest]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest , and [his]297-his brain pained when [he]297-his attempted to remember [her]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest name . [She]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest was [a bank investor]300-a bank investor ; [he]297-his could remember only that much and no more , for [he]297-his had n’t been interested in what [she]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest had to say when [she]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest ’d blabbered all night at [the Gala]1-the gala . [He]297-his ’d merely paid attention to the fact that [she]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest had a comely figure with long , toned legs that were accentuated by [her]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest six - inch heels , which had the effect of [him]297-his demanding a few hours of exploration . Though there was no hope , [he]297-his tried again for [her]299-the olive - skinned , platinum blonde who was having a meal of his chest name … [Lacy]58-lacy … [Lucy]59-lucy … [Lisa]60-lisa … ah hell , [he]297-his did n’t know and [he]297-his did n’t care . [Nameless Blond]61-nameless blond pressed [her]61-nameless blond plum lips against the middle of [his]297-his chest and murmured in a sultry voice that caressed [him]297-his in places that [he]297-his really preferred to remain inert at the moment . “ [I]61-nameless blond want more . So much more of [you]297-his . Let ’s go all night , [I]61-nameless blond ’m not yet sated . ”[61-nameless blond] A sigh flowed from [him]297-his as [he]297-his mentally kicked [himself]297-his for almost falling asleep with [a woman in [his]297-his bed]301-a woman in his bed . “ Well , [I]297-his am . Get dressed . [Moore]62-moore will take [you]297-his [home]2568-home . ”[297-his] The covers flipped back with a simple flex of [his]297-his muscular arm and [he]297-his swung [his]297-his feet to the red carpeted floor , then used the heels of [his]297-his hands to rub the weight of sleep from [his]297-his eyes . No avail . Through an emerging yawn , [he]297-his added , “ Oh , great sex by the way . Thanks . ”[297-his] The protesting muscles of [his]297-his limbs told [him]297-his just how exhausted [he]297-his was . [Lovello]63-lovello was right : [he]297-his burned [himself]297-his out far too much . [His]297-his eyelids felt like a Ziploc bag loaded with quarts . It occurred to [him]297-his , as [he]297-his fought with sleep at the edge of the bed , that there was no shuffling from [Nameless Blond]61-nameless blond . Turning , [he]297-his pointed [his]297-his stare on [the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as [she]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom clutched the black silk sheet over [her]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom bosom]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom . Wrestling with the anger that started to build inside [him]297-his , [he]297-his took a calming breath and said , “ Did [I]297-his not tell [you]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom to get dressed ? ”[297-his] [Her]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom voice was gravelly when [she]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom asked , “ So [I]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom ’m just a ‘ great sex ’ that [you]297-his send off with a ‘ thanks ’ ? ”[302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom] Closing [his]297-his eyes , [he]297-his pinched the bridge of [his]297-his nose . Telling [a woman]303-a woman to leave more than once had never happened before , because [he]297-his was n’t normally this tired , and when [he]297-his was n’t this tired , [he]297-his was everything analogous to [a whirling devil]304-a whirling devil . And so , when [he]297-his gave a command , [women]305-women usually sensed the peril and knew better than to argue . “ Pretty much . Thought [you]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom understood what this was . ”[297-his] Lazy as [his]297-his eyes felt at the moment , [he]297-his flicked them open with evident severity and pinned them to [hers]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom . “ Get the hell up and get going , [woman]2569-woman ! Or so help [me]297-his … ”[297-his] Recording [his]297-his seriousness at last , [Nameless Blond]61-nameless blond scrambled from the bed and crept around on the fluffy red carpet retrieving pieces of [her]302-the blond - haired creature whose green eyes shone with tears as she clutched the black silk sheet over her bosom clothes . The weak shade of light from the corner lamp silhouetted [his]297-his tall , muscular frame in the darkness as [he]297-his stood nude and pensive before the window . [He]297-his marveled at how alluring [her]61-nameless blond green eyes were . But alluring as they were , [he]297-his favored eyes that were seductively brown . A smile brightened [his]297-his face . Chapter One

Iridescent rays danced across [my]0-i partially nude body as [I]0-i wrapped [my]0-i bare , long legs around the cold stainless steel that was , at the moment , [[my]0-i fortress]319-my fortress . Imbibing half bottle of Coffee Patrón within a two - hour span was proving to be a really , really bad idea . [My]0-i mind was a vortex , [my]0-i vision turbid and [my]0-i bones liquefied . [I]0-i opened [my]0-i eyes and regarded [[my]0-i onlookers who bore lascivious smiles and held green bills aloft]320-my onlookers who bore lascivious smiles and held green bills aloft . [All]321-all were [wealthy and powerful business men whose wives were either forty pounds heavier than when [they]321-all ’d first tied the knot to do any justice to a sexy lingerie , or [they]321-all ’ve simply lost the sparks [they]321-all once had]322-wealthy and powerful business men whose wives were either forty pounds heavier than when they ’d first tied the knot to do any justice to a sexy lingerie , or they ’ve simply lost the sparks they once had . Ensconced in [[his]71-mr. mysterious in black rented booth]323-his rented booth , [a lone sporter as usual]324-a lone sporter as usual , regarding [me]0-i intently . Weird , was how [I]0-i ’d describe [him]71-mr. mysterious in black . [He]71-mr. mysterious in black never dances with [anyone]325-anyone , but merely sits in [[his]71-mr. mysterious in black booth]326-his booth all night and stares at [me]0-i , watching [my]0-i every move . Sometimes [I]0-i get the inane thought that [he]71-mr. mysterious in black ’s [some sort of [a serial killer who preys on [vulnerable women]329-vulnerable women]328-a serial killer who preys on vulnerable women]327-some sort of a serial killer who preys on vulnerable women . But if [my]0-i distant scrutinies did n’t lie , then [I]0-i ’d say [he]71-mr. mysterious in black ’s one alluring sonuvabitch . Viewing [him]71-mr. mysterious in black up close was necessary to be ascertained , though . Not like that ’s ever going to happen . Chapter Two

Brilliant sunrays came bursting through [[my]0-i bedroom]389-my bedroom windows , coercing [me]0-i from [my]0-i sleep . [My]0-i eyes opened in reluctance and an instantaneous headache pounced upon [me]0-i . Hangover . Today would be a weighty , mood - swinging day , [I]0-i could tell . Rising from [my]0-i slumber , [I]0-i dragged [myself]0-i to [the bathroom]392-the bathroom . [My]0-i hideous reflection stared back at [me]0-i in the mirror , cognac irises surrounded by lashes as long as palm tree leaves . [My]0-i heart - shaped face was all mascara - blotched and lipstick - smeared . And [my]0-i twenty - six inches of chocolate brown ripples were tangled in knots . [Death]85-death resembled [me]0-i . Deciding on a long , hot shower , [I]0-i denuded [myself]0-i and hopped beneath the steaming shower . Tensed muscles soon relaxed as hot water sprayed over [my]0-i body . Scorching , [I]0-i liked it that way . Sometimes [I]0-i think [I]0-i have an addiction to pain . It ’s distracting . Tossing [my]0-i head back , [I]0-i let the water beat on [my]0-i face , stinging [my]0-i sensitive skin . [Lord]393-lord , what was to become of [me]0-i now ? [I.]0-i Am . Such . A mess . That tragic and unexpected news [I]0-i received last night still had [me]0-i horrifically shocked . Though , [I]0-i could n’t understand why it was a ‘ shock ’ when [I]0-i ’d known it was bound to happen sooner or later . A mere month after breaking up with [him]394-him . A mere month . And now [he]394-him was gone . It was the work of a divine intervention that [I]0-i ’d timely mustered up the courage and left [him]394-him . For sure , as soon as [I]0-i realized that [I]0-i was a mess on [my]0-i own , [I]0-i would ’ve gone back to [him]394-him . As [I]0-i always did . When [Tevin]80-tevin had brought [me]0-i the news last night about [him]394-him , [[my]0-i ex - boyfriend]395-my ex - boyfriend [Cali D]64-cali d , being murdered in [[his]394-him house]396-his house , [I]0-i ’d slipped into momentary shock . Chapter Seven

Deep masculine laughter swirled with soft feminine laughter above the low flowing of [Common]122-common ’s [I]0-i Want [You]731-you in [[Natalio]101-natalio ’s vehicle]732-natalio ’s vehicle as [we]733-we drove into [[my]0-i apartment complex]734-my apartment complex . Of course , [Natalio]101-natalio ’s attire was an exception ; [he]101-natalio wore [his]101-natalio usual black . [I]0-i was still in the dark about [his]101-natalio line of work , but [all the invitees of the yacht party]736-all the invitees of the yacht party were [posh pomps who all referred to [him]101-natalio as ‘ [Nelson]101-natalio ’]737-posh pomps who all referred to him as ‘ nelson ’ . [I]0-i ca n’t fall asleep . [I]0-i do n’t think [I]0-i will be able to , not until [I]0-i hear from [you]101-natalio . Help [me]0-i ?

Chapter Ten

[No one]295-no one knew , with certainty , [his]101-natalio genesis . And [he]101-natalio divulged no such details to [anyone]325-anyone either , it mattered not who inquired . [Natalio]101-natalio Nelson

Chapter Fifteen

Five weeks passed …

Chapter Twenty Four

In the safety of [Natalio]101-natalio ’s arms , [I]0-i stood reticent as [the family]2404-the family engaged in dull conversations , waiting patiently and without complaints for the dinner ’s commencement . For [me]0-i , it was one helluva wait . What was taking so long ? It was just food . [I]0-i ’d scarcely finished the thought when [a rotund , middle - aged manservant]2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant emerged through a set of double doors that had been closed on the right , holding a wand that seemed much too heavy for [his]2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant proportion . [He]2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant held it aloft before slicing it through the air and hitting it against a huge gold gong that [I]0-i had n’t even noticed was there . The blow elicited a loud , grating bang , ceasing all chattering and yanking [everyone]2708-everyone ’s attention . “ Good evening , [everyone]2708-everyone , ”[2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant] [he]2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant said courteously . “ Dinner shall inaugurate . ”[2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant] [He]2405-a rotund , middle - aged manservant stepped aside and gestured to the double doors that were immediately pulled open by [another pair of [menservants]2408-menservants]2407-another pair of menservants . [All the Nelsons]125-the nelsons garnered single file and walked through the double doors . About [The Author]292-the author

S. [Ann Cole]55-ann cole is [a passionate writer and reader]2552-a passionate writer and reader , and a lover of anything that distracts [her]55-ann cole from [the real world]2553-the real world . [Ms. Cole]287-ms. cole is not [[your]2554-your typical girl]2555-your typical girl . [She]287-ms. cole hates chocolate , candle - lit dinners and all that hearts and flowers stuff makes [her]287-ms. cole feel awkward , coffee makes [her]287-ms. cole drowsier than ever , and [she]287-ms. cole tends to talk to [herself]287-ms. cole , a lot . Having an obsessive and unquenchable affair with the written word , [she]287-ms. cole ’s naturally [a recluse who dwells inside [her]287-ms. cole imagination and has to suffer continual bashings from [[her]287-ms. cole friends]2557-her friends for being [a neglectful pal who does nothing but sit around the computer all day , writing]2558-a neglectful pal who does nothing but sit around the computer all day , writing . Like [a big kid]2559-a big kid , [Ms. Cole]287-ms. cole loves watching [Disney Channel]54-disney channel]2556-a recluse who dwells inside her imagination and has to suffer continual bashings from her friends for being a neglectful pal who does nothing but sit around the computer all day , writing . like a big kid , ms. cole loves watching disney channel , enjoys a big bowl of Honey Bunches of Oats cereal and prays to [[our]2560-our [God]67-god]2561-our god like it ’s [nobody]2934-nobody ’s business — well , it really is n’t . When [she]287-ms. cole is n’t abusing [her]287-ms. cole computer keyboard , [you]2563-you can find [her]287-ms. cole nosing a novel , stressing with school assignments , tweeting about every minuteness of [her]287-ms. cole life , or disturbing [[her]287-ms. cole neighbors]2564-her neighbors with [her]287-ms. cole rugged voice , trying and failing to hit those notes of [Beyonce]288-beyonce ’s Listen ( [she]287-ms. cole really ought to leave the singing department alone ! ) Lean in a little closer , here ’s a secret [she]287-ms. cole wants to share with [you]2563-you .
